resources.string: Enter name of the movie or genre

This application is demo application and is part of a course project in Teleric Academy. The app is designed to create a movie database and meet the demands of the greatest movie admirers. The films are classics of the century and are presented in good style. The app contains information about several dozen movies, there is an option for users to add their favorite movie, there is information about the application itself and the ability for the user to report. The app also allows the user to vote for their favorite movie. Application development has been made possible thanks to Android Studio and SpringMVC REST services. Developed the app: Georgi Delchev and Kristian Evtimov.
